intro: Liriosma pallida, commonly known as the pale liriosma, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Commelinaceae, which includes grass-like plants and some ornamental species. Due to its adaptability, it can thrive in a variety of soil types and is often found in moist, shaded environments.
